title: Number of knife crimes in London 2010 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of offences (in 1,000s), containing a total of 9 data points.
Overall Number of offences (in 1,000s) has increased over the Year.

Number of offences (in 1,000s) is roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2011/12, slightly decreasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13, roughly constant from 2012/13 to 2015/16, gradually increasing from 2015/16 to 2017/18, and finally roughly constant from 2017/18 to 2018/19.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
The highest Number of offences (in 1,000s), of value 14.84 was reached at Year 2018/19
The lowest Number of offences (in 1,000s), of value 9.69 was reported at Year 2014/15
